channel.title: Aceh Mandheling on fREW Schmidt's Clog (Coffee Blog)
channel.description: Recent content in Aceh Mandheling on fREW Schmidt's Clog (Coffee Blog)

item.title: Blend
item.description: Blend 1lb Ethiopia Dry Process Yirga Cheffe Wenago 1⁄4 lb Sumatra Aceh-Mandheling Sweet Maria’s Wenago is a nice late season Ethiopia, and anything but subtle: strawberry, raspberry, red apple, stone fruit, fading to sweet tobacco and aromatic wood notes in the long finish. (and above) Very little stone flavors. Fairly bland. Maybe this isn’t good for cold brew? â˜¹

item.title: Sumatra Aceh-Mandheling
item.description: Roasted differently than normal; dropped heat gun to low during first crack. I think that this underroasted the beans just a little. Coffee is still good but in addition to last week’s notes it tastes a little green.

item.title: Sumatra Aceh-Mandheling
item.description: Sweet Maria’s: Brooding dark cacao notes, pulpy fruit, dried banana, lingonberry, mossy, forest floor-type earthiness, herbacious Very rich and strong; Agree re mossy, forest floor, and herbacious. Prefer FC+ to French. This may grow on me, but as it stands this coffee is really not my style
